layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x272
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x272
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,16) size 784x248
      LayoutBlockFlow {p} at (0,0) size 784x18
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 124x18
          text run at (0,0) width 124: "TH VALIGN=TOP"
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,34) size 693x214 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection (anonymous) at (1,1) size 691x212
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 691x208
            LayoutTableCell {th} at (2,2) size 204x208 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutImage {img} at (2,2) size 200x200
            LayoutTableCell {th} at (208,2) size 481x22 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 477x18
                text run at (2,2) width 325: "The top of this text should be vertically aligned "
                text run at (326,2) width 153: "to the top of the image"
